quotes.author: James Allen
quotes.quote: A man is literally what he thinks, his character being the complete sum of all his thoughts.

quotes.author: James Allen
quotes.quote: He thinks in secret, and it comes to pass: Environment is but his looking-glass.

quotes.author: Mark Twain
quotes.quote: I've lived through some terrible things in my life, some of which actually happened.

quotes.author: Wallace D. Wattles
quotes.quote: ... because all things have contributed to your advancement, you should include all things in your gratitude.

quotes.author: Chuck Geschke
quotes.quote: We're going to out-invent the bastards!

quotes.author: Wallace D. Wattles
quotes.quote: By thought, the thing you want is brought to you; by action you receive it.

quotes.author: Mark Twain
quotes.quote: You canâ€™t depend on your eyes when your imagination is out of focus.

quotes.author: Bruce Lee
quotes.quote: Adapt what is useful, reject what is useless, and add what is specifically your own.

quotes.author: Wallace D. Wattles
quotes.quote: The very best thing you can do for the whole world is to make the most of yourself.

quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi
quotes.quote: Live as if your were to die tomorrow, Learn as if you were to live forever.
